meanings.definition: A person who struggles or fights against adversity.
meanings.sent1: The brave strugglers never gave up in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent2: The group of strugglers worked together to overcome their difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The strugglers in the race kept pushing forward with determination.
meanings.sent4: The strugglers in the boxing ring battled fiercely for victory.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strugglers climbing the mountain will stay with me forever.

meanings.definition: A team or group that is having difficulty or facing challenges.
meanings.sent1: The football team were determined strugglers despite the tough competition.
meanings.sent2: The strugglers in the project brainstormed ideas to solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: The group of strugglers laughed together despite the setbacks.
meanings.sent4: The strugglers in the escape room raced against the clock to find the key.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strugglers supporting each other is heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The act of struggling or exerting effort to overcome obstacles.
meanings.sent1: The strugglers in the gym lifted weights to build their strength.
meanings.sent2: The hikers faced a steep hill, becoming determined strugglers.
meanings.sent3: The strugglers in the dance class tripped over their own feet.
meanings.sent4: The strugglers in the marathon pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strugglers swimming against the current is inspiring.
